title: CSE 110 Pantry Pal
description: This project involved using OpenAI's APIs for GPT, DALLE, and Whisper to generate recipes for users when they prompted the application with a list of ingredients.

title: CSE 158R Recommender Systems Project
description: A recommender systems project where we implemented and finetuned our own recommender system models and compared them to prebuilt models from Python libraries such as Tensorflow and Surprise.

title: COGS 108 Data Science Project
description: This project focused on applying data science techniques to measure and predict student satisfaction with a course using data scraped from CAPES.
